title: ICLR 2018 Conference Acceptance Decision
comment:
This work introduces a new type of structured attention network that learn latent structured alignments between sentences in a fully differentiable manner, which allows the network to learn not only the target task, but also the latent relationships. Reviewers seem partial to the idea of the work, and it's originality, but have issues with the contributions. In particular:

- The reviewers note that the gains in performance from using this approach are quite small and do not outperform previous structured approaches.
